statements: SELECT * FROM research_publications_metadata;
SELECT title, authors FROM research_publications_metadata WHERE publication_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT title, journal_name FROM research_publications_metadata WHERE publication_id = 3;
SELECT publication_id, title, publication_date FROM research_publications_metadata WHERE journal_name = 'Nature';
SELECT publication_id, authors, doi FROM research_publications_metadata WHERE publication_date < '2021-09-01';
SELECT * FROM research_publications_metadata WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM research_publications_metadata WHERE journal_name='Nature' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT publication_id, title, authors FROM research_publications_metadata WHERE doi IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM research_publications_metadata WHERE title ILIKE '%machine learning%';
SELECT publication_id, title, journal_name FROM research_publications_metadata ORDER BY publication_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM research_publications;
SELECT publication_title, publication_author FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT publication_id, publication_title FROM research_publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT publication_title, publication_author FROM research_publications WHERE publication_author LIKE '%John%';
SELECT rp.publication_title, pm.metadata_key, pm.metadata_value FROM research_publications rp JOIN publication_metadata pm ON rp.publication_id = pm.publication_id;
SELECT publication_id, publication_title FROM research_publications WHERE publication_author='John Doe'
SELECT * FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT publication_author, COUNT(*) AS publications_count FROM research_publications GROUP BY publication_author ORDER BY publications_count DESC

SELECT publication_title, metadata_key, metadata_value FROM research_publications JOIN publication_metadata ON research_publications.publication_id = publication_metadata.publication_id WHERE metadata_key='category'

SELECT publication_date, AVG(metadata_value) AS avg_metadata_value FROM research_publications JOIN publication_metadata ON research_publications.publication_id = publication_metadata.publication_id WHERE metadata_key='rating' GROUP BY publication_date HAVING avg_metadata_value > 4
SELECT * FROM ResearchPublications;
SELECT title, authors FROM ResearchPublications WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT publication_id, title, journal FROM ResearchPublications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT keyword FROM PublicationKeywords WHERE keyword LIKE '%machine learning%';
SELECT r.publication_id, r.title, p.keyword FROM ResearchPublications r JOIN PublicationKeywords p ON r.publication_id = p.publication_id;
SELECT * FROM ResearchPublications;
SELECT title, authors FROM ResearchPublications WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT publication_id, journal FROM ResearchPublications ORDER BY journal DESC;
SELECT * FROM PublicationKeywords WHERE keyword = 'machine learning' ORDER BY keyword_id ASC;

SELECT r.publication_id, r.related_publication_id, p.title AS publication_title, q.title AS related_publication_title FROM PublicationRelated r JOIN ResearchPublications p ON r.publication_id = p.publication_id JOIN ResearchPublications q ON r.related_publication_id = q.publication_id;
SELECT * FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT title, authors FROM research_publications WHERE journal = 'Science';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM research_publications WHERE authors LIKE '%John Doe%';
SELECT * FROM research_publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, abstract, journal FROM research_publications WHERE doi IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, authors, publication_date FROM research_publications WHERE journal = 'Science' AND publication_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, authors, journal FROM research_publications JOIN publication_metadata ON research_publications.publication_id = publication_metadata.publication_id WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM research_publications JOIN publication_metadata ON research_publications.publication_id = publication_metadata.publication_id WHERE keyword_id = 3 ORDER BY publication_date DESC;

SELECT title, authors, journal, keyword FROM research_publications JOIN publication_metadata ON research_publications.publication_id = publication_metadata.publication_id JOIN publication_keywords ON publication_metadata.keyword_id = publication_keywords.keyword_id WHERE publication_metadata.author_id = 2;
SELECT title, authors, publication_date FROM research_publications;
SELECT * FROM research_publications WHERE publication_id = 1;
SELECT abstract FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT publication_id, title FROM research_publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, authors FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM research_publications;
SELECT title, authors FROM research_publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT publication_id, title, abstract FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT author_name, title FROM publication_authors INNER JOIN research_publications ON publication_authors.publication_id = research_publications.publication_id;
SELECT tag_name, title FROM publication_tags INNER JOIN research_publications ON publication_tags.publication_id = research_publications.publication_id ORDER BY publication_tags.tag_name ASC;
